website_summaries.verdict: A solid fan with a strong clip that also doubles as a charging station for your phone.
pros: Uses USB to charge included batteries
Fan can also be used to charge your phone
This option can run 6 hours on a charge (on maximum)
Comes with a diffuser sponge for essential oils
cons: Fan is a bit on the loud side
Some complaints that it arrived missing parts such as batteries

customer_reviews.title: Very good compact fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan it’s very quiet and charges Quick and it lasted two days but the only thing about it I only had this for a month and a half and it stopped working I charged it I even bought new rechargeable batteries for it still isn’t working it says it’s on it lights up that it’s turned on but the fan does not work very disappointed stopped working after a month The seller actually contacted me and refunded me a new fan there is a one year warranty on them so they sent a new one to me within two days very fast
customer_reviews.author: articia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fan For Office or Gym
customer_reviews.text: Needed a portable fan for work and spin class; very happy with this Opolar Clip On fan. It's very quiet and I like the infinite speed settings. It's a little bit large to carry around as a handheld but great for the office and gym, when I can clip it to stationary bike handlebars. I typically charge it only once a week. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little portable fan. It's fairly strong. I usually aim it right at my face. It will run for hours. The variable speed is much nicer than the 3 or 4 speed models--you can set it exactly where you want. It makes a quiet whine that doesn't bother me but annoys my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H. Reese

customer_reviews.title: If you charge daily it's a good Fan.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I liked this product more. It looked great online... But battery life is worse than expected. We go on a 45 minute walk twice a day, it has to be charged between walks to be effective. Annoying to have to charge that often. The swivel and 360 rotation is nice and the clips works well just about any where. I will say I do have to re position. The fan often as it s not very sturdy. We do like the little essential oil (or bug reppelant) spot on the back. I spray babyganics bug spray on this and it really helps protect her from bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Good Fan...But didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this fan for the first month. It has great power, rechargeable feature is awesome, and definitely versatile. But I haven’t used it in a while (2 months) and tried to use it today and it has quit working...it will turn on for about 5 seconds and then turns off again...even when plugged in 😒 I’m sad!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the car, stroller, or crib.  Long battery life.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the rarer fans that use 2 batteries instead of 1. The run time on it is great! I use it in the car to direct some airflow into a toddler's car seat and clip it onto a crib on hot nights. No wires to deal with and has a fully adjustable speed control dial versus only a few speeds on other models. I want to get another, but the price increased since I last bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Love this little fan
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this little personal fan. It's powerful, lightweight , stable and easy to adjust . Plus it's a power bank for my phone too. I love it so much so I bought two more for my family .
customer_reviews.author: Krit Jongnarangsin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Got it to clip on my son’s stroller. We live in florida so it get pretty hot, but it helps cool him off and last suprisingly long so far. Only used it a few times and yet to recharge. Says it can go for about 5 hours on high which i can believe at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable fan
customer_reviews.text: It works great, as far as the batteries lasting, had it running outside for over six hours and bought more rechargeable batteries thinking it would run out in a couple of hours & didn’t need to. At full blast we were still able to talk without raising our voices over it.
customer_reviews.author: M.Rose

customer_reviews.title: seems to work good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to sleep with while we are camping and it worked pretty good on low all night for some light air and white noise. It did work all night on low, not sure how long it will last on a higher speed. I will say, that it's not very powerful and if you want it to work on multiple people, you may want to buy two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely design
customer_reviews.text: Like the color and the special design. There is a small round pad you can put in the pit on the back. A few drops of essential oil on it makes the wind this fan blows small so relaxing. It is a must for Baby stoller in this heat.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: These work great and are very easy to position as needed.
customer_reviews.text: We use these for van camping. After a full charge (approx. 6-8 hours) we get 6-7 hours on high. Turned it down to medium and got two nights worth before charging again. They were quite powerful and feel sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good little fan!
customer_reviews.text: So far these (we purchased one and after receiving ordered another) to use In our golf cart. We use them one day playing 27 holes of golf with no issues. Doesn’t care about a great airflow but enough to make your moves during our hot Florida summers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne E. Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Have my little one a good breeze while in stroller. Simple and easy to adjust. Instructions say how long it would last at different speed settings. I’m satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for the car seat & the stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for the car seat & the stroller!! I love the battery option that makes this portable!
customer_reviews.author: Nick and Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This fan is very powerful for its size. We use it on my daughters stroller and it clips anywhere. It’s small so it’s easy to put in the diaper bag. We actually turn the speed down because it can get too powerful for the baby. It charges fast as well. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M.

customer_reviews.title: Somethings Missing
customer_reviews.text: Worked quite well for just over one year. The charging port did not last and broke apart. The seller said they would replace and sent me 5 fans to choose from - I choose the newest one and still have not seen a delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the most convenient things I’ve ever purchased on Amazon. It lasts for hours on end and can even charge other devices. The full setting hits hard and the fan is super portable.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Dorelus

customer_reviews.title: It’s rechangeable so can easy bring out and save money for baterry
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice fan, pretty color. It’s rechangeable so can easy bring out and save money for baterry. I was used it for my baby stroller yestoday,easy to clip. I also like it have different speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Rain Rain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little fan! Used it all weekend camping and never even had to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: a.schoppert

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power
customer_reviews.text: This has been my best purchase on Amazon. It’s great for travel, small spaces & can attach to just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: You will get a breeze
customer_reviews.text: This fan was a life saver! It is hot hot here in Florida! Good Price, fast delivery Buy one you will love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great little Fan
customer_reviews.text: I attach this to my microphone stand and it keeps me cool for hours. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Al Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Exactly how it should be
customer_reviews.text: This thing lasts forever and does exactly what I need it to do...a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Brady M. Sexton

customer_reviews.title: No issues but the speed adjustment isn't necessary
customer_reviews.text: It's a no frills fan that gets the job done. The speed dial is a bit of an overkill as I've never used the fan at less that full speed. It charges fast enough and does clip on to the stroller just fine. Also purchased the slightly cheaper version with no speed adjustment and that's probably the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Fan works great, moves lots of air and batteries run for a long time
customer_reviews.text: The only negative detail that I found on the fan was that the micro usb port, like most other micro usb ports, won't last on the fan. Seems most phones and accessories using micro usb ports suffer the same weakness.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Keeping cool
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work and there's no plug close, so the battery power is a must. It's been 100° here at it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a long time in one charge
customer_reviews.text: I got this fan to take on a cruise. It works great. Very versatile and functional. After a full charge, it ran 10 hours on high and 12 hrs on med. Just was I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen B.

customer_reviews.title: Broke a month after we. Bought it
customer_reviews.text: The micro USB port broke about a month and a half after we bought it. Not happy with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy- Long battery life and actually pushes cool air!
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts for days. We have had it since Aug '18 and goes to every theme park with us. My 15 month old never complans about the FL heat. It clips right on to his stroller. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great fan !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the stroller. It keeps our new born cool. I was surprised by how much air it moves. Work great. Got it for weeks. Really satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motor dead after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this fan until it stopped working after 3 months. Motor is dead, it will light up on the side showing it's on but wont move at all.
customer_reviews.author: DANA M. BRAZIL

customer_reviews.title: prefect little fan
customer_reviews.text: It worked great, nice quite little fan. The battery lasted all day, the only problem is the batterys that came with it will no longer charge. (ive only charged the batterys 5x's)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Item worked for about a week. Sent it back cost me around ~$8 for shipping. Got my money back. But lost money due to shipping. Don’t buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: bradycardic

customer_reviews.title: Blows Strong
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great! My dad works in construction and he loves his clip on fan! It’s perfect for the Florida heat and blows strong!
customer_reviews.author: harley

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few months..
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these fans and both are broken... would be nice if they would send replacements as they are expensive little fans.
customer_reviews.author: daniel hileman

customer_reviews.title: For it's size, it's POWERFUL! We live in ...
customer_reviews.text: For it's size, it's POWERFUL! We live in FL. so this was NEEDED. I loooove that I can also charge my phone with it, as it serves as a powerbank.
customer_reviews.author: La_Jess

customer_reviews.title: convenience
customer_reviews.text: the fan is small enough to fit on my office desk. it is not big,but it has enough power. very convenience!!
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I have to admit I'm a FAN now!
customer_reviews.author: Juan HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan and I am very happy that I bought it. The base, even when not used as a clip, is very stable and although small, the fan is very powerful at full speed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Literally had it for a little over a month and the fan completely stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Angelica R.

customer_reviews.title: Single-use Fan don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Micro USB port stopped working on second use and, unfortunately, that was after the return window by two weeks
customer_reviews.author: B Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids love it on the stroller the fans last a long time. It was will worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Fan works great and stays charged for awhile so far. Not disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Used Item
customer_reviews.text: No cushion at all. It came used with no USB. How am I suppose to charge it?
customer_reviews.author: Vossaurus

customer_reviews.title: No battery
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with a battery pack as advertised. The battery bay is too long to use a set of AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good but for small space
customer_reviews.text: Small, portable, easy to swivel around in two axis, clip on with rubber grips to protect smooth surfaces from scratches. The fans' back side comes with slot to place sponge. Sponge could be dabbed with essential oils according to the listing (I haven't done it yet). It's a perfect fit for my baby's crib. I can power it up with a micro USB or just by the batteries included with the fan. So for a few hours it can be moved around with the battery back up. Fan has small indicator for showing battery charging, battery in use, USB power in use etc. 1 star less for the slight noise it makes when it is turned on the max speed.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed..........
customer_reviews.text: Am i wrong in thinking since this fan takes 2 batteries instead of 1, it should be at least somewhat more powerful??? Well answer is NOPE..... I have the opolar single battery fan and on high it is just as powerful as this 2 battery fan,what gives?? wish this fact was mentioned in product description but it was not. i guess they designed it for long run time over more power but again no mention of this fact. product being returned...........
customer_reviews.author: fitzy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like to review too early BC it’s better for y’all to get an honest review. I’ve had this fan for about 5 months. I’ve used it off and on during that time. The design is awesome. You can only charge it with a lithium battery station using usb connection. I use my power bank or my solar power pack. You can’t just use a cell phone charger plug in. But it’s very powerful. I can’t tell you if it will hold up for a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan!
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this in her vehicle when traveling with our terrier. I also purchased a 10' cord for it and can move it all over the vehicle. It has a USB so you don't lose your plug. The fan is variable speed, which is nice. As far as battery longevity, we ran it for approx. 4-5 hours before we noticed a decline in fan speed. The clip is a nice feature too. And yes, this small fan moves air!
customer_reviews.author: Possum

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fan For Hot People!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m visiting my children & their home is warm. I can’t stand the heat. This little fan stands alone as well as clipping on furniture. It has different speeds & I don’t know how I ever got by without one. It holds a charge for hours. I bought a different fan and it was junk. This was made much sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Such a great little fan!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this little fan! It is the best! The battery lasts a very good amount of time! I forgot I had it on th elowerst speed and left it on all night. It was still going the next morning. That says a lot to me. The clip is real strong. I’ve clipped to many things and it just stays put till I move it.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: I've had this little fan for over a year now. My wife uses it every day for work,(40 hrs) at her front-end as she's a supervisor at a grocery store. She loves it. It's got quite a few hrs on it by now, and still working strong!! Great purchase by far for a little work fan!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dumont

customer_reviews.title: Size matters!
customer_reviews.text: This little fan has a lot of power and does the job. Only issue is the fan does not operate for very long without a power source. At work, I plug it into my docking station. At home, I plug it into the wall or external battery. I plan to take this on a camping trip. The size makes it very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis L

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is awful
customer_reviews.text: Battery only lasted just under an hour with a full charge. Overall construction seems cheap but sturdy enough. Clip makes it easy to attach to many surfaces. However the batteries are just terrible. It even has a USB port for charging, but there is no way the provided batteries are strong enough to provide a decent charge to anything.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: This little fan is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Pretty powerful for such a tiny thing, not very noisy, and can clip on anything. I have had it for over 10 months. I try to charge it every couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Can replace batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can replace batteries. My other Opolar that's about same size has built-in Batts. This comes in handy if you don't want to fool with recharging, just pop in Batts. and your back in action.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little fan, great output.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it, as it turns out I have no need for it. But this little fan puts out a LOT of air! The batteries already had some charge when I got it, which was a plus. I would buy it again if I had a real use for it. The aromatherapy diffuser option is a nice perk.
customer_reviews.author: Clurr Frizzle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to use on my stroller at an amusement park. It worked great! However, I had issues with it charging after the first time as it was defective. I emailed the seller and they sent me a replacement within 24 hours. I’d definitely recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Metz

customer_reviews.title: It's so cool!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it takes two 18650 lithium batteries. I carry extra and keep them charged while driving. When I'm stationary in my camper van it's nice that the fan isn't drawing from my house batteries. I will get another one for my Airstream.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and efficient  for small space
customer_reviews.text: “So far it has been most satisfactory for what I need. I like its size , which I use in a small bathroom counter area. I like its power & ease of use. I really needed to be cool to get my makeup on on hot days. I would recommend it to a friend.”
customer_reviews.author: E.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan but died 6 months later
customer_reviews.text: When something dies, you replace the batteries. I did this and it still won't work. Don't buy from OPOLAR.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A Caddell Jr

customer_reviews.title: A Definite must have.
customer_reviews.text: Best portable fans ever. They worked all day long while we vacation at disney in Florida. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Boriqua Baby

customer_reviews.title: Worked great all day for my toddler while we took her ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Worked great all day for my toddler while we took her to Sesame Place. Did not test the Aromatherapy part yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: micro sub is the worst plug idea for providing power
customer_reviews.text: the charge port was flimsy and broke after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Walker

customer_reviews.title: Really handy little fan!
customer_reviews.text: So far this is working great! I love the variable speed knob. This little fan really comes in handy!
customer_reviews.author: Nick K.

product_meta.title: OPOLAR Clip Fan, 5200mAh Battery Operated USB Fan, Power Bank Function, Strong Grip, Clip and Desk Fan 2 in 1, Perfect Personal Rechargeable Fan for Baby Stroller, Crib, Treadmill, Camping, Outdoor
feature_bullets: 【COMPACT MINI SIZE】The lightweight and handy clip & desk fan in one, easy to carry and store, can be placed or clipped anywhere you want, great for baby stroller, home and office, laptop, gym workout, outdoors, camping, trips, etc.

【QUIET OPERATION】 The 4.3 inch frame fan and 3500RPM rotating speed produces a strong airflow. Even when operating at the max. speed, the fully charged battery will last for 6 long hours. It makes the clip on fan extremely suitable for outdoor travel.
【STRONG GRIP CLAMP】It is so easy to clip it on to any surface with a strong clamp for firm grip. Just clip it on baby stroller, treadmill, office, school, RV or dorm.
【POWER BANK FUNCTION】Charge your phone or any 5V USB compatible devices in emergency cases. The fan can also works 6-48 hours per charge basing on its' built-in battery.

【5200MAH BATTERY】 With the upgraded 5200mAh rechargeable battery (removeable), the fan can wor 6-48 hours (depending on the speed you use) once fully charged. You can charge the fan by connecting it to a USB cable (included). If you have any problems while using, please contact us at support@opolar.com

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars107 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
